title: I Maybe Falling For A Liar
itunes:title: I Maybe Falling For A Liar
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 30 year old divorced female and I’m working on my master’s degree in nursing so I wasn’t focused on dating after my divorce. But, 6 months ago, I met an amazing 25 year old man that was heaven sent! He’s tall, dark and handsome with a nice house, car, and two jobs. He is my everything and he takes good care of me. He pays bills, cooks, cleans, everything. There is just one big problem that I have with him and I need your advice to see if it’s a dealbreaker..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
